pages.title: Upgrade Module
pages.text: The Upgrade Module accepts Productive Bees upgrades. These apply to apiary processing while keeping PB's balance.

pages.title: Speed (Base Time)
pages.text: Reduces the effective time per operation according to Productive Bees rules. Place in the Upgrade Module's dedicated slot.

pages.title: Productivity
pages.text: Increases the total outputs per completion. Productivity scales in tiers following Productive Bees' upgrade levels.

pages.title: Comb Block
pages.text: Allows producing comb blocks when applicable. The apiary recognizes these upgrades in the same way Productive Bees hives do.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: Exact upgrade items are provided by Productive Bees/Productive Lib. The apiary checks and applies them using the same logic as PB.
